name: Pick The Gold
description:
You are Lucky if you find Gold or Silver,
You are Master if you find Saphire or Emerald,
But you are RICH if you find Diamond !!!

!!! Pick The Gold !!!


Improve your tools,
Dig Deeper,
Discover the treasures of Earth !!!
publishers: CUBE GAMES YAZILIM SANAYI TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
